data.eml:eml: A new species of Tapiena (Orthoptera: Tettigonioidea: Phaneropterinae) from Brunei Darussalam (Borneo, Southeast Asia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Ming Kai, Wahab, Rodzay Bin Haji Abdul (2018): A new species of Tapiena (Orthoptera: Tettigonioidea: Phaneropterinae) from Brunei Darussalam (Borneo, Southeast Asia). Zootaxa 4413 (1): 193-196, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.1.9
